CustomField.formula: IF(NOT(ISNULL(Unit_No__c)) && NOT(ISBLANK(Unit_No__c)), Unit_No__c+' ' , '')+IF(NOT(ISNULL(Street_No__c)) && NOT(ISBLANK(Street_No__c)), Street_No__c+' ' , '')+IF(NOT(ISNULL(Street_Name__c)) && NOT(ISBLANK(Street_Name__c)), Street_Name__c+' ' , '')+IF(NOT(ISNULL(Duplicate_Street_Type__c)) && NOT(ISBLANK(Duplicate_Street_Type__c)), Duplicate_Street_Type__c , '')+', '+IF(NOT(ISNULL(clcommon__City__c)) && NOT(ISBLANK(clcommon__City__c)), clcommon__City__c+' ' , '')+IF(NOT(ISNULL(Duplicate_State_Name__c)) && NOT(ISBLANK(Duplicate_State_Name__c )), Duplicate_State_Name__c+' ' , '')+IF(NOT(ISNULL(clcommon__Postal_Code__c)) && NOT(ISBLANK(clcommon__Postal_Code__c)), clcommon__Postal_Code__c , '')+', '+IF(NOT(ISNULL(Country__c)) && NOT(ISBLANK(Country__c)), Country__c+' ' , '')
CustomField.label: Full Address
